name: My enemies became my companions
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: The Empress Dowager who ruled on behalf of the emperor, the pure and flawless Saintess of the Demonic Sect, the one-armed sword master ranked ninth in the world, the emotionless Celestial Maiden of Mount Taihua, and the chivalrous yet tender-hearted Sword Master of the Spring and Autumn Periodâ€¦ Danger lurks everywhere. In a past life, they were my mortal enemies. In this life, they are my concubines. They once all tried to kill me. So now, they have all submitted to me in shame and humiliation.
